Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the ice rink in Adelaide, South Australia, will be turned into a morgue for COVID-19 victims. The South Australia Department of Health and ICE ArenA both confirmed that the claim is false.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or official confirmation that the ice rink will be used as a morgue.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the ice rink in Adelaide will be used as a morgue without any basis or evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation exists as ice rinks have been used as temporary mortuaries in other countries, but there is no evidence to support this claim specifically for Adelaide.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the situation by stating that 500 body bags were delivered to the ice arena, which is not supported by any evidence.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting misleading information and not providing sufficient evidence to support its claim.
